Habanera

Located in Madrid City centre, this restaurant with 900m2 has a colonial style and offers a relaxed athmosphere to disconnect from the city stress.

It has a central patio of 8m high that gives natural lighting to all the restaurant and it has a lot of vegetation reproducing the tropical clima and relaxed atmosphere

The restaurant Habanera offers seasonal dishes, a mix of Mediterranean and Trocpical cuisine all of them elaborated with high quality ingredients

Location: Madrid center

Dining room capacities: 300 pax

Price Level: average-high

Style: International mixed cuisine

Vegetarian Options/Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
